snippet: Labor Department data released on Thursday showed that the number of Americans filing for jobless benefits fell last week, suggesting the economy is still fundamentally healthy even as growth slows.
abstract: Labor Department reports weekly claims for state unemployment benefits fell by 10,000 to seasonally adjusted 277,000.
lead_paragraph: Labor Department data released on Thursday showed that the number of Americans filing for jobless benefits fell last week, suggesting the economy is still fundamentally healthy even as growth slows.

headline.main: Job Market Remains Strong Even as U.S. Economy Slows
headline.print_headline: Job Market Remains Strong Even as U.S. Economy Slows
